description: With succulent chicken thigh pieces and winter vegetables tossed in a simple sweet and savoury sauce, this flavoursome recipe makes a perfect easy dinner when you canâ€™t be bothered to cook.
name: Honey Soy Chicken & Vegetable Stir-fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.3 pkt Woolworths RSPCA approved chicken thigh fillets bulk pack, fat trimmed, thickly sliced
0.5 pkt Woolworths frozen winter veg mix

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse rice under cold water, then place in a medium saucepan. Add 1 1/2 cups cold water. Cover and simmer over low heat for 15 minutes or until rice is cooked. Remove pan from heat and stand covered for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine oil, honey, soy and cornflour in a medium bowl. Add chicken and stir to coat.

Heat a large frying pan or wok over medium-high heat. Cook chicken mixture, in 2 batches, for 5 minutes, stirring, or until golden. Transfer to a bowl and cover to keep warm. Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until tender. Return chicken to pan and cook for 2 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Divide rice among bowls. Top with stir-fry and serve scattered with coriander.
